mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Request (title, body, price, memberId, term) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{price}, #{memberId}, #{term})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.memberId, r.title, r.price, r.inserted, r.state FROM Request r JOIN Member m ON m.id = r.memberId ORDER BY r.id DESC
SELECT r.id, r.memberId, r.title, r.price, r.inserted, r.state FROM Request r JOIN Member m ON m.id = r.memberId WHERE r.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.id DESC
